channel.title: A nice clean folder fit for making RSPS work faster - Realm Onwards Program
channel.description:
[size=36pt]Please delete if this has nothing to do with "Server Tutorials" I am sorry if it doesn't[/size] [font=Trebuchet Ms][center][size=5][u][b]A nice clean folder fit for making RSPS work faster[/b][/u][/size] [font=trebuchet ms][center][size=5][u][b]Part of the: Realm Onwards Program[/b][/u][/size][/center] [ul][li][iurl=#introduction]Introduction[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#base]The base of it all[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#concept]The concept[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#txt]Filling your .txt files[/iurl][/li] [li][iurl=#credit]Credit[/iurl][/li][/ul] [center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center] [center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center] [size=2][b][anchor=introduction]1.0 - Introduction[/b][/size] Hello! I would like to introduce you to Arham's "Special Clean Folder" What this does is that it provides faster navigation and allows you to plan the future of your server. It also provides a faster navigation to tutorials and lists. Models are located with an ease by the Models folder. And taking models out are a piece of cake due to the organization they have! Just take a good look, learn it, and you'll be able to make servers up to 2x faster. [center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center] [size=2][b][anchor=base]2.0 - The base of it all[/b][/size] Now to start, right click your desktop and name your file you servers name. [img]http://img546.imageshack.us/img546/751/clean1.png[/img] Now, open it and put: [ul][li]Folder: *Your servers name* Client[/li] [li]Folder: *Your servers name* Source[/li] [li]Folder: Models[/li] [li]Folder: Compiled Models[/li] [li]Folder: Official Release[/li] [li]Text File: Edits[/li] [li]Text File: Needed[/li][/ul] [URL=http://img805.imageshack.us/i/clean3.png/][IMG]http://img805.imageshack.us/img805/470/clean3.png[/img][/URL] Now download [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,530221]this[/url] and put those in your folder too. Now open Models and put the following folders: [ul][li]2-handed weapons[/li] [li]Amulet[/li] [li]Arms[/li] [li]Body (or you can name it torso)[/li] [li]Cape[/li] [li]Head[/li] [li]Legs[/li] [li]Misc[/li] [li]NPC[/li] [li]Ring and Gloves[/li] [li]Weapon[/li][/ul] [URL=http://img846.imageshack.us/i/clean2.png/][IMG]http://img846.imageshack.us/img846/5813/clean2.png[/img][/URL] Now copy and paste these folders you made in Models and put them in Compiled Models [center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center] [size=2][b][anchor=concept]3.0 - The Concept[/b][/size] The 'fastness' of this is that it allows quicker and navigation. Using the arrow in your folder, you can get to folders 5 seconds faster, and that all adds up. (This is only for Windows Vista and 7) [URL=http://img861.imageshack.us/i/clean4.png/][IMG]http://img861.imageshack.us/img861/7683/clean4.png[/img][/URL] Also, you can get to tutorials faster. Lets say your having a bad day and you forgot some VERY SIMPLE thing. Simply go in the mini-tutorials folder and your VERY SIMPLE things are there! [URL=http://img13.imageshack.us/i/clean5k.png/][IMG]http://img13.imageshack.us/img13/4199/clean5k.png[/img][/URL] Also, if your adding something, and don't know the ID to it, simply go to the List folder for all your IDs! [URL=http://img84.imageshack.us/i/clean6.png/][IMG]http://img84.imageshack.us/img84/2061/clean6.png[/img][/URL] The Models and Compiled Models folder allows you quick access to models. The
Now open Models and put the following folders: [ul][li]2-handed weapons[/li] [li]Amulet[/li] [li]Arms[/li] [li]Body (or you can name it torso)[/li] [li]Cape[/li] [li]Head[/li] [li]Legs[/li] [li]Misc[/li] [li]NPC[/li] [li]Ring and Gloves[/li] [li]Weapon[/li][/ul]
allows your WHOLE MODELS to be so organized, you can actually figure out what's what. [center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center] [size=2][b][anchor=txt]4.0 - Filling your .txt files[/b][/size] Now, it's the final part of the tutorial. Now, open your Needed.txt file. Now, put this: [/center] [code]*****Needed Things for RSPS***** -1 thing here -Another thing here -Another thing here and so on...[/code] [center] Fill that up! Now, open Edits.txt and put: [/center] [code] Format: Name: Date: What you did [detailed]: Example: Arham December 31th, 2011 Made a tutorial [/code] [center] Now your done! Happy New Year from America everyone! [center][s]__________________________________________________________________________[/s][/center] [size=2][b][anchor=credit]5.0 - Credits[/b][/size] [b]Everyone mentioned in my Server Downloads[/b] [b]Arham 4:[/b] Making this [b]Moparscape:[/b] Making this amazing forums! If you like this, then you'll probably like these: [ul][li][url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,529971.0.html]How to make a .ini file for your server[/url][/li] [li][url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,529659.0.html]Realm Onwards - The RSPS for Newcomers - PI Version - NEW NAME[/url][/li] [li][url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,530221.0.html]Mini-Tutorials and List folder - Part of the: Realm Onwards Program - V2 OUT[/url][/li][/ul]

item.title: A nice clean folder fit for making RSPS work faster - Realm Onwards Program
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[size=36pt]Please delete if this has nothing to do with “Server Tutorials” I am sorry if it doesn’t[/size]

[font=Trebuchet Ms][center][size=5]A nice clean folder fit for making RSPS work faster[/size]
[font=trebuchet ms][center][size=5]Part of the: Realm Onwards Program[/size][/center]

[ul][li][iurl=#introduction]Introduction[/iurl][/li]
[li][iurl=#base]The base of it all[/iurl][/li]
[li][iurl=#concept]The concept[/iurl][/li]
[li][iurl=#txt]Filling your .txt files[/iurl][/li]
[li][iurl=#credit]Credit[/iurl][/li][/ul]

[center]__________________________________________________________________________[/center]
[center]__________________________________________________________________________[/center]

[size=2][anchor=introduction]1.0 - Introduction[/size]
Hello! I would like to introduce you to Arham’s “Special Clean Folder” What this does is that it provides faster navigation and allows you to plan the future of your server. It also provides a faster navigation to tutorials and lists. Models are located with an ease by the Models folder. And taking models out are a piece of cake due to the organization they have! Just take a good look, learn it, and you’ll be able to make servers up to 2x faster.

[center]__________________________________________________________________________[/center]

[size=2][anchor=base]2.0 - The base of it all[/size]

Now to start, right click your desktop and name your file you servers name.

Now, open it and put:

[ul][li]Folder: Your servers name Client[/li]
[li]Folder: Your servers name Source[/li]
[li]Folder: Models[/li]
[li]Folder: Compiled Models[/li]
[li]Folder: Official Release[/li]
[li]Text File: Edits[/li]
[li]Text File: Needed[/li][/ul]

Now download this and put those in your folder too. Now open Models and put the following folders:

[ul][li]2-handed weapons[/li]
[li]Amulet[/li]
[li]Arms[/li]
[li]Body (or you can name it torso)[/li]
[li]Cape[/li]
[li]Head[/li]
[li]Legs[/li]
[li]Misc[/li]
[li]NPC[/li]
[li]Ring and Gloves[/li]
[li]Weapon[/li][/ul]

Now copy and paste these folders you made in Models and put them in Compiled Models

[center]__________________________________________________________________________[/center]

[size=2][anchor=concept]3.0 - The Concept[/size]

The ‘fastness’ of this is that it allows quicker and navigation. Using the arrow in your folder, you can get to folders 5 seconds faster, and that all adds up. (This is only for Windows Vista and 7)

Also, you can get to tutorials faster. Lets say your having a bad day and you forgot some VERY SIMPLE thing. Simply go in the mini-tutorials folder and your VERY SIMPLE things are there!

Also, if your adding something, and don’t know the ID to it, simply go to the List folder for all your IDs!

The Models and Compiled Models folder allows you quick access to models. The

Now open Models and put the following folders:

[ul][li]2-handed weapons[/li]
[li]Amulet[/li]
[li]Arms[/li]
[li]Body (or you can name it torso)[/li]
[li]Cape[/li]
[li]Head[/li]
[li]Legs[/li]
[li]Misc[/li]
[li]NPC[/li]
[li]Ring and Gloves[/li]
[li]Weapon[/li][/ul]

allows your WHOLE MODELS to be so organized, you can actually figure out what’s what.

[center]__________________________________________________________________________[/center]

[size=2][anchor=txt]4.0 - Filling your .txt files[/size]

Now, it’s the final part of the tutorial. Now, open your Needed.txt file. Now, put this:
[/center]

[code]Needed Things for RSPS

-1 thing here
-Another thing here
-Another thing here

and so on…[/code]
[center]
Fill that up! Now, open Edits.txt and put:
[/center]

Format:

Name:
Date:
What you did [detailed]:

Example:
Arham
December 31th, 2011
Made a tutorial

[center]
Now your done! Happy New Year from America everyone!

[center]__________________________________________________________________________[/center]

[size=2][anchor=credit]5.0 - Credits[/size]

Everyone mentioned in my Server Downloads
Arham 4: Making this
Moparscape: Making this amazing forums!

If you like this, then you’ll probably like these:

[ul][li]How to make a .ini file for your server[/li]
[li]Realm Onwards - The RSPS for Newcomers - PI Version - NEW NAME[/li]
[li]Mini-Tutorials and List folder - Part of the: Realm Onwards Program - V2 OUT[/li][/ul]

Read full topic
item.source: A nice clean folder fit for making RSPS work faster - Realm Onwards Program
